transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji sir, good afternoon. Pritam baat kar raha tha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir main bol raha tha paanch minute abhi time hai sir abhi free the aap?
Customer: Nahi kis cheez ke liye sir?
Executive: Sir technical team se ek baar video meet ek baar connect karna tha. Wo log network wagera thoda sa check kar rahe the kuch. Main bola tha main technical agar possible ho to main ek baar arrange kara deta hu aapke saath.
Customer: Koi dikkat nahi hai abhi bhi wahi dikkat dikha raha hai sir. Maine sab kuch try kiya tha usme wahi abhi bhi aa raha hai sir.
Executive: Haan main samajh raha hu sir. Isliye maine aage na raise kara tha. Ab wo bol rahe hai ki network ka connection nahi de to aisa kare. Maine bola sir client ko bhi aise agar main pareshan karunga wo bhi issue hai aur aap bhi ek le lenge to technical word hai jo ki na main karwa paunga na koi customer karega. To agar aap thoda sa coordinate kare to sir ek technical team se hi hum log ek arrange kara dete hai video meet. To wo hi thoda sa ek baar check kar lenge.
Customer: Theek hai koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Mereko thoda sa time dijiyega main ek baar confirm kar raha hu unse fir baat karte hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Okay. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Facing a persistent technical issue.
- Needs to connect with the technical team for a resolution.


Resolution:

- Agreed to a video meet with the technical team.
- Executive will arrange the video call for troubleshooting.


Next Steps: 
Issue not resolved. Executive will confirm with the technical team and arrange a video call.

Alert (If Any):
None

@@@Sentiment:
- Neutral -> Neutral | Non-urgent -> Non-urgent

@@@Key Topics:
- technical issue, network, video meet, technical team, support
